page.title: 05FARMING IN LINTON
page.content: There are 5 farms in our area,these are Greenditch,Rivey,Grip,Chilford Hall and Heath.Rivey farm is on a hill,it grows crops which are Wheat,Barley and Corn.Greenditch farm is at the bottom of Rivey Hill.It is like Rivey farm but also grows Oil seed Rape and Sugarbeet.Heath farm & Grip farm are the same as the others.None of these have animals.We also have Borley Wood in our area.This is a game reserve. The main farm is Chilford Hall.80% of the land grows crops and 20% is a vineyard.They make about 25,000 bottles a year.They only make white wine but use 5 different kinds of grapes.60% of it goes to the public and 40% is improved on. Written by:S Fleet,A Stott,J Cottage, C McNeil and A Atkinson.
